# importall

Usage:

```
$ python -m importall click --exclude="_winconsole.py"
click ok
click._bashcomplete ok
click._compat ok
click._termui_impl ok
click._textwrap ok
click._unicodefun ok
click.core ok
click.decorators ok
click.exceptions ok
click.formatting ok
click.globals ok
click.parser ok
click.termui ok
click.testing ok
click.types ok
click.utils ok
$ echo $?
0
```
